file_content.text: I am risking my life to wait here. Are you ready to take the adrenal?
Inject me. I'm ready to go in.
You are lucky I have another adrenal. Please be still.
Good--you made it. I am Norvaan Kel, adviser to Portho the Hutt. He told me you were coming.
This adrenal is Portho's favorite--very strong. Once I administer it, you pass out. Then I smuggle you inside the palace.
This will only take a second....
We are inside the palace, but the Republic--they have discovered Portho's betrayal!
I will escape in the disorder. You must hurry before they notice your intrusion.
Our meeting puts me at great risk. Please hurry back when you are ready.
